div.head: Peiping #2
div.p: 7/23/49 Tgm 538 from Tientsin re closing USIS offices (request of Local Military - see Tientsin card) Waddell-FE states also closed at Nanking, Shanghai, Peiping & Hankow.

1/24/50 - DA Mailing Notice No. 11 Tientsin instructed on January 14, 1950 to close as soon as transportation could be arranged. Brit. to handle American interests. Mail should be sent in accordance with Dept. Regs., Dept. Announcement No. 221 and DA Mailing Notice No. 1.

2/7/50 - Tel. 302 2/7/50 from Peiping: Following official seals destroyed Jan. 11: 1 metal impression, 2 rubber stamps, 1 metal wax impression AMCONGEN Changchun; 2 rubber stamps AMCON Changchun; 1 metal impression, 1 rubber stamp, (CONT 374 F) 1 metal wax impression AMCONGEN Harbin, all foregoing seals having been entrusted custody ConGen on closure Changchun office Feb. 21,1948. Also destroyed metal impression seal 1 rubber stamp, 1 metal wax impression inscribed AMCON Peiping, these latter being in disuse.
2/15/50 - Navy Dept. tel to Dept. of this date No. 152031Z re auth. to Peiping to destroy ASTALUSNA files.
2/21/50 - Deptel. 157 to Peiping relating message from Chief of Naval Operations to destroy ASTALUSNA files,

row.cell: Shanghai tel. 905 3/1/50 listing classified material addressed Peiping/Tientsin/Mukden destroyed.

Peiping Tel. 404, 2/25/50 - Consulate proposes turn over protection services Brit. Consulate Gen. about mid-March in order that there shall be short trial period while we are still in Peiping for consultation.
Tel. 460, 3/6/50 from Peiping re restoration of Con. telephone service as of 3/4/50.
Tel. 451, March 3, 1950 from Peiping - Peiping USIS files in main destroyed.
Tel. 494 from Peiping of March 10 - 3 cases refrigerator parts and publications shipped Hong Kong per SS Hunan departing Taku Bar March 2
Tel. 486, 3/9/50, listing date of departure of personnel. also Tel. 458, 3/6/50 from Peiping.
DEPTEL to Peiping 234, 3/16/50 - Submit list destroyed files.

Peiping tel. 525, March 15 approved. DEPTEL 238, March 17 to Peiping - Dept. concurred opinion Nanking regarding issue renewal passports when passports expire after July 1 for two reasons - 1. Grant passport facilities carries implication this govt. can and will protect holder. 2. limitation outstanding valid passports lessens danger passports being used to detriment US if lost stolen. Dept offers no objection renewal or issue passports when present passports will expire any time up to end 1950 if holders reside interior
